name: Yummiclix
overview: Yummiclix.com lets fans of food and eating out take photos of meals and share them with their friends and family while making it possible for them to raise funds for food banks and non-profit charities that feed families in our communities. Yummsters organically generate visual menus of local restaurants and eateries’ yummilicious plates. There is no better way to end hunger then by posting a photo of your meal and letting other Yummsters donate to your favorite charity or food bank.
